DOC.brief_summary: Community-Acquired Pneumonia has become common. Additionally, the mortality is high. But the epidemiology of pathogen is various in different areas, which is crucial for the key treatment. In addition, the risk factors of patients who died in 3 or 7 days in china is not clear, comparing with patients who died in 14 or 28 days or who survived.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Characteristics and Microbiology of Community-Acquired Pneumonia
DOC.criteria: Confirmed community acquired pneumonia Ageâ‰¥18 ys HIV infection
